fields.name: timeday_id
fields.description: Conditionally required (either timeday_id or time_day). Foreign key to time_set_definitions.

fields.name: time_day
fields.description: Conditionally required (either timeday_id or time_day). XXXXXXXX_HHMM_HHMM, where XXXXXXXX is a bitmap of days of the week, Sunday-Saturday, Holiday. The HHMM are the start and end times.

fields.name: free_speed
fields.description: Optional. Free flow speed in long_distance units per hour

fields.name: lanes
fields.description: Optional. Number of permanent lanes (not including turn pockets) in the direction of travel open to motor vehicles. It does not include bike lanes, shoulders or parking lanes.

fields.name: bike_facility
fields.description: Optional. Type of bicycle accommodation: unknown, none, WCL, sharrow, bikelane, cycletrack, offstreet path

fields.name: ped_facility
fields.description: Optional. Type of pedestrian accommodation: unknown, none, shoulder, sidewalk, offstreet path

fields.name: parking
fields.description: Optional. Type of parking: unknown, none, parallel, angle, other

fields.name: allowed_uses
fields.description: Optional. Set of allowed uses that should appear in either the use_definition or use_group tables; comma-separated.

name: link_tod.schema.json
description: Handles day-of-week and time-of-day restrictions on links
